response.overview: Oscar is a small fish whose big aspirations often get him into trouble. Meanwhile, Lenny is a great white shark with a surprising secret that no sea creature would guess: He's a vegetarian. When a lie turns Oscar into an improbable hero and Lenny becomes an outcast, the two form an unlikely friendship.
response.tagline: Behind every little fish is a great white lie.
response.title: Shark Tale

cast.name: Sean Bishop
cast.character: Tip Fish #1 / Great White #4 / Whale / Killer Whale #1 (voice)
